Package org.opends.sdk.spi

Interface Summary
ControlDecoder<T extends Control> An interface for decoding controls.
ExtendedOperation<R extends ExtendedRequest<S>,S extends Result> Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBindRequest<R extends BindRequest> An abstract Bind request which can be used as the basis for implementing new authentication methods.
AbstractExtendedRequest<R extends ExtendedRequest<S>,S extends Result> An abstract Extended request which can be used as the basis for implementing new Extended operations.
AbstractExtendedResult<S extends ExtendedResult> An abstract Extended result which can be used as the basis for implementing new Extended operations.
AbstractIntermediateResponse<S extends IntermediateResponse> An abstract Intermediate response which can be used as the basis for implementing new Intermediate responses.
AbstractMessage<R> An abstract message which can be used as the basis for implementing new requests and responses.
AbstractResult<S extends Result> An abstract result which can be used as the basis for implementing new results.
